data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=iFW-b7xp96sQ7kNvgHh79Tj&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCX1RtuQ-g36sCwvCSLaXK3D_1Jp5dn8IMPwf2QXHY_yA&oe=669657B7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=NfQQWBHZM-AQ7kNvgETUMgF&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA04FxrRhSNyYAStL778BpU7dQ_39hVJH2cTu0m1B4jkQ&oe=66966552)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=nwjB6sKhi3oQ7kNvgHXqDIY&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBrdUz-AVGAekjg4PTCh3tf-RVtPmr2o7lk2cHFOblfpg&oe=66965089)
